name: eCheck Processing eCheckProcessing.com
author: eCheckProcessing.com

sections.description:
The eCheck Processing plugin works with WooCommerce and our own eCheckProcessing.com Gateway to process electronic check payments on your website. The “eCheck” payment option will appear at checkout.

The plugin is safe and secure. It is fast and simple to install.

You must have a Processing Account. Sign up for a quick and easy Approval at https://www.echeckprocessing.com/apply. Account Approval is guaranteed for all legally operating businesses with U.S. based Bank Accounts. This is a non-ACH Electronic Check solution, perfect for High Risk Merchants.

You can also accept checks-by-phone using our Virtual Terminal in the Payment Gateway. There are never any Chargebacks!
sections.installation:
1. Click “Install Now” button, then click “Activate” button.
  2. Navigate to WooCommerce Settings submenu.
  3. Click “Payments” tab.
  4. Enable by toggling on “eCheck Processing – eCheck” slider and then clicking “Manage” button on the right.
  5. Add your username, and password, we provide.
  6. Click “Save Changes”.
  7. Run a test transaction from your WooCommerce shopping cart.

Screenshots available under screenshot tab or our detailed Installation Guide. You may also speak to our support team by phone.
sections.faq:
Is it required that I sign up for an account with eCheckProcessing.com to use the plugin?

Yes. Approval is 100% guaranteed for your legally operating business. The process is fast and easy. We even approve all High-Risk businesses. Sign Up at eCheckProcessing.com and we will get you the required API URL, Username, and Password.

Banks consider my business a “High Risk” merchant. Can you still get me approved?

Yes. Our service is the perfect payment solution for many different high-risk businesses.

Will the plugin work with WooCommerce?

Yes. The plugin is designed to work with your WooCommerce shopping cart. If you need other alternatives, just contact us.

What if I want to take payments without WooCommerce?

You can! We have unique solutions for clients with unique needs, no matter your situation.

Are there Chargebacks with your eChecks?

No. There are never any Chargebacks or Chargeback Fees for eChecks as there are with Credit Card Merchant Accounts.

Is there a more detailed eCheckProcessing.com plugin installation guide?

Yes. The plugin is already easy to install and configure, but if you want additional installation details and images, please refer to our Installation Guide. We also have our own support team available by phone.
sections.changelog:
1.6

  • Tested with Woo 6.6.1
  • Tested with WP 6.0
  • Removed unnecessary contributions

1.5

  • removed bulk edit filter override

1.4

  • Release Date – 4 Dec 2020*
  • Tested with Woo 4.7.1
  • Tested with WP 5.5.3
  • Removed Option for api url
  • removed unneeded code for cc payments
  • removed support for tokenization, subscriptions, refunds

1.3

  • Release Date – 21 January 2020*

  • Minor code/ code documenation tweaks

  • eCheck processing eCheckProcessing.com
